meanings.sent1: The oversubtle details in the painting were hard to notice.
meanings.sent2: She had an oversubtle way of complimenting others, making them feel special.
meanings.sent3: The oversubtle flavors in the dish confused my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His oversubtle hints about the surprise party almost gave it away.
meanings.sent5: The oversubtle fragrance of the flowers filled the room delicately.

meanings.definition: too clever or intricate for practical use
meanings.sent1: The oversubtle design of the gadget made it hard to operate.
meanings.sent2: Her oversubtle plan to solve the puzzle impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The oversubtle mechanism in the clock caused it to malfunction unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: His oversubtle excuse for being late was easily seen through.
meanings.sent5: The oversubtle code in the software made it crash frequently.
